data.eml:eml: A new brachypterous species of Elachiptera Becker (Diptera: Chloropidae) from freshwater wetlands in eastern Canada

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wheeler, Terry A. (2003): A new brachypterous species of Elachiptera Becker (Diptera: Chloropidae) from freshwater wetlands in eastern Canada. Zootaxa 360: 1-6, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156164, URL: http://mapress.com/zootaxa/2003f/zt00360.pdf
